17/05/2021

SRO selected by Vinnova

Stålmarck Resource Optimization (SRO) awarded innovation grant from Vinnova - Sweden's Innovation Agency. Together with our beta customers, we will develop a strong proof-of-concept.
The project extends over six months. We work together to produce a first version of an automated scheduling tool that home care companies can use to improve their continuity, save time and increase their efficiency.
